title: S16 Ep74: Darkness Radio presents The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It with Jeff Belanger
itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It with Jeff Belanger
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It with Jeff Belanger

Today we take an interesting look in the actual case that inspired the hit horror movie The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It with our long time friend Jeff Belanger.  Jeff grew up around Ed & Lorraine Warren and has a unique insight into their cases, lives and shines some light on the very strange case of Arne Johnson. 

Was the Devil truly to blame for the crime of murder or was it one bad night of drinking and flared tempers that ended a mans life?  Jeff walks us through the story of a claim of possession, an exorcism gone wrong, and the violent, bloody aftermath that captured the attention of the world in a criminal case where the defense would be, not one of insanity, but demonic possession.

See the hit new movie in theaters and on-demand now.

Visit Jeff Belanger here: www.JeffBelanger.com

Listen to Jeff's hit podcast series here: www.OurNewEnglandLegends.com
